name: KnockBlock
description:
KNOCK BLOCK

A game about knocking blocks off other blocks while trying to keep your block from being knocked off blocks.

Knock Block is a local multiplayer game for 2-4 people using controllers.

Instructions

Left Stick: Move
Right Stick: Aim Projectiles
Left Bumper: Jump (hold for higher jump)
Left Trigger: Dash (in Left Stick direction)
Right Trigger: Fire Projectile

Knock other players off the screen to win
Collect Tokens to increase projectile force
